siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan was late to recording for the first time ever. Turns out he was installing a Ring doorbell. He has some other home improvement projects in store for this week. We talked about Jon’s 30th birthday last week but it turns out the festivities weren’t over yet. Jon…

frontmatter.title: Celebrating Jon's Birthday All Month
tags: life with a twist of lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Jon turned 30! Hear about his 30th birthday and Stan feeling old. You can still give him the gift of a 5 star review on iTunes. Sunday was also Mother’s Day. By request of Angie who works in the same building as Jon, we talk about what we did for our Mother’s on…

frontmatter.title: Lawnmowing, email newsletters, and what we're reading.
